[2018-12-16 06:03:36]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,descr FROM cms_master_list WHERE category_id = 24


[2018-12-16 06:03:36]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,descr FROM cms_master_list WHERE category_id = 28


[2018-12-16 06:03:36]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
				FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
				WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
				 UNION ALL
				SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
				cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
				FROM
				cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
				WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:03:37]

Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 06:03:50]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 06:03:50]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 06:17:23]
Business Layer: {"token":"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98","method":"get_outbound_list","data":{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}}

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL

                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL

                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details :

[2018-12-16 06:25:13]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 06:28:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1

 Param Details: 
SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as category,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_outbound_document 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no='18-0000001'

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 06:28:33]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_outbound_list

{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 06:28:39]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 06:28:41]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:28:41]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:28:41]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:28:41]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

 Param Details:

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment

				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 06:31:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:31:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:31:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:31:21]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:31:22]

 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id

				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name

				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 06:32:21]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 06:32:21]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15

SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 06:49:37]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 06:49:37]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 06:49:38]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 06:49:57]

                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 07:22:57]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:22:57]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:22:57]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:22:57]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 07:23:35]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:23:35]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:23:37]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:23:37]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:23:37]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:23:37]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:23:38]

 Param Details: 
SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26


[2018-12-16 07:23:38]

 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:23:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,descr FROM cms_master_list WHERE category_id = 35

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:23:39]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 07:23:54]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:23:54]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:23:54]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:23:54]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 07:26:49]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:26:49]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:27:00]

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:27:00]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:27:00]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:27:00]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:27:00]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 07:27:09]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:27:09]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:27:09]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:27:09]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:27:10]

 Param Details: 
SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26

[2018-12-16 07:27:10]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:27:10]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:27:21]

Function Details: db_query

[2018-12-16 07:27:21]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:27:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:27:21]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:27:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 07:28:12]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:28:12]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:28:12]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:28:12]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:28:13]

[2018-12-16 07:28:13]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:28:14]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:28:27]

Function Details: db_query

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 07:28:27]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:28:27]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:28:27]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:28:27]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 07:30:23]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:30:23]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:30:23]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:30:23]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 07:37:39]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:37:39]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:37:39]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:37:39]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 07:37:41]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:37:41]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:37:54]

Function Details: db_query

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 07:37:54]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:37:54]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:37:54]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:37:54]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 07:38:10]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:38:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:38:10]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:38:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 07:38:56]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:38:56]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:38:56]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:38:56]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:38:57]

SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26

[2018-12-16 07:38:58]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:38:58]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:39:07]

Function Details: db_query

[2018-12-16 07:39:07]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:39:07]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:39:07]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:39:07]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 07:41:17]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:41:17]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:41:17]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:41:17]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 07:41:19]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:41:19]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:41:46]

Function Details: db_query

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 07:41:46]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:41:46]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:41:46]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:41:46]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 07:42:52]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:42:52]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:42:52]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:42:52]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 07:42:56]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:42:56]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:42:56]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:42:56]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 07:43:10]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:43:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:43:10]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:43:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 07:48:06]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:48:06]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:48:06]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:48:06]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:48:07]

SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26

[2018-12-16 07:48:08]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:48:08]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:48:20]

[2018-12-16 07:48:20]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:48:20]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:48:20]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:48:20]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 07:49:08]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:49:08]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 07:49:08]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:49:08]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 07:49:09]

SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26

[2018-12-16 07:49:10]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:49:10]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:49:28]

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 07:49:28]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:49:28]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:49:28]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:49:28]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 07:50:27]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:50:27]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:50:27]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:50:27]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 07:50:43]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:50:43]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 07:51:11]

[2018-12-16 07:51:11]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:51:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:51:11]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:51:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query

SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 07:51:43]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:51:43]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 07:52:17]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 07:52:17]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 07:52:17]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 07:52:17]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 07:52:26]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 07:52:26]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:07:50]

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:07:50]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:07:50]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:07:50]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:07:50]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as category,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_outbound_document 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no=''

[2018-12-16 08:08:14]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:08:14]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:08:14]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:08:14]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as category,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_outbound_document 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no='0'

[2018-12-16 08:08:45]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:08:45]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:
