9%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:09:11]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:09:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:09:11]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:09:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:10:51]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:10:51]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:11:33]

[2018-12-16 08:11:33]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:11:33]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:11:33]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:11:33]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 08:18:53]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:18:53]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:18:57]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:18:57]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:18:57]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:18:57]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:18:58]

 Param Details: 
SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26

 Param Details:

 Param Details:

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:18:58]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:19:21]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:19:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:19:21]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:19:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

%09%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:20:07]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:20:07]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:20:07]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:20:07]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

09%09%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:20:18]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:20:18]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:20:18]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:20:18]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:20:42]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:20:42]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:20:42]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:20:42]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:20:54]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:20:54]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:21:38]

Function Details: db_query

[2018-12-16 08:21:38]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:21:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:21:38]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:21:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 08:22:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:22:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:22:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:22:11]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:22:12]

[2018-12-16 08:22:13]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:22:13]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 08:22:41]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:22:41]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:22:41]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:22:41]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query

SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:23:03]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:23:03]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

A%09%09%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:23:52]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:23:52]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:23:52]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:23:52]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query

SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:24:13]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:24:13]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

9%09%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:24:47]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:24:47]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:24:47]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:24:47]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:25:43]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:25:43]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:26:19]

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

9%09%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:26:19]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:26:19]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:26:19]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:26:19]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as category,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_outbound_document 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no='0'

[2018-12-16 08:27:49]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:27:49]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 08:27:51]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:27:51]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:28:05]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1

SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_outbound_list

{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:28:07]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:28:22]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:28:22]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:28:22]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:28:22]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:28:34]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:28:34]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 08:31:55]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:31:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:31:55]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:31:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

Function Details: is_token_valid 
 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:32:06]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:32:06]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:33:38]

9%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:33:38]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:33:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:33:38]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:33:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 08:33:48]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:33:48]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:34:29]

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

9%09%09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 08:34:29]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:34:29]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:34:29]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:34:29]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:52:50]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:52:50]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:52:52]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:53:41]

SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_outbound_list

[2018-12-16 08:53:43]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:53:59]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:53:59]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:53:59]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:53:59]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 08:58:46]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:58:46]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:58:46]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 08:58:46]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 08:58:48]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:58:48]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 08:58:58]

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 08:58:58]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 08:58:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 08:58:58]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 08:58:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 08:59:00]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 08:59:00]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 09:01:31]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:01:31]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:01:31]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:01:31]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:01:32]

 Param Details: 
SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26

 Param Details:

 Param Details:

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 09:01:33]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 09:01:42]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 09:01:42]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 09:01:42]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 09:01:42]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 09:02:24]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 09:02:24]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, amount
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 09:04:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:04:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:04:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:04:34]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 09:04:54]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 09:04:54]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 09:04:54]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 09:04:54]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 09:08:49]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 09:08:49]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 09:08:49]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:08:49]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:08:50]

[2018-12-16 09:08:51]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 09:08:51]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 09:09:10]

Function Details: db_query

[2018-12-16 09:09:10]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 09:09:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 09:09:10]

 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 09:09:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 09:09:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 09:09:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 09:09:58]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:09:58]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 09:09:59]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 09:09:59]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 09:10:10]

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 09:10:10]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 09:10:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 09:10:10]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 09:10:10]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 09:10:11]

[2018-12-16 09:10:29]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 09:10:29]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, amount
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 09:12:09]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 09:12:10]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 09:12:11]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, amount
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 09:14:32]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, amount
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

09%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A%09%09%09%3C!--%20end%20footer%20module%20--%3E%3C%2Ftd%3E%0A%09%09%3C%2Ftr%3E%0A%09%3C%2Ftbody%3E%0A%3C%2Ftable%3E%0A","emp_id":"15","attachment":[]}


[2018-12-16 09:26:51]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"outbound_no cms_outbound_document"


[2018-12-16 09:26:51]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(outbound_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS outbound_no  FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY outbound_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 09:26:51]
Function Details: is_data_exist 
 Param Details : 
"cms_outbound_document outbound_no 18-0000001"


[2018-12-16 09:26:51]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(*) as id_count FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 09:27:03]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, amount
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'
