[2018-12-16 10:49:53]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 10:49:53]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 10:49:56]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1

 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 10:49:56]

 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 10:49:56]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 10:49:58]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_mail_signature 
 Param Details :

[2018-12-16 10:52:02]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:52:02]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"16"


[2018-12-16 10:52:02]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 16 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:52:14]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"16"


[2018-12-16 10:52:14]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 16 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:52:17]
Function Details: smtpmailer 
 Param Details : 
"Email Sent : sancheev@gmail.com CC'ed : sancheev@gmail.com"


[2018-12-16 10:52:17]

 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 10:52:18]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 10:52:18]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 10:52:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:52:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:52:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:52:34]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:52:35]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT template_content FROM cms_master_template WHERE id = 26


[2018-12-16 10:52:35]

 Param Details:

Function Details: get_outbound_list

{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 10:52:36]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id

				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to

				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount

				, cms_outbound_document.approvals

                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:53:52]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 10:53:52]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 10:53:52]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as category,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_outbound_document 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no='18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 10:53:56]
Function Details: get_mail_signature 
 Param Details : 
"sancheev@gmail.com"


[2018-12-16 10:53:56]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:53:56]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"16"


[2018-12-16 10:53:56]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 16 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 10:55:25]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no='18-0000001'

[2018-12-16 10:55:28]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:55:28]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"16"


[2018-12-16 10:55:28]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 16 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

				, cms_outbound_document.amount

				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name

                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)

[2018-12-16 10:57:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 10:57:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:57:21]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name

                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)

				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date

 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 10:57:37]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as category,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_outbound_document 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no='18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 10:57:37]
Function Details: get_mail_signature 
 Param Details : 
"sancheev@gmail.com"


[2018-12-16 10:57:37]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:57:37]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"16"


[2018-12-16 10:57:37]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 16 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 10:57:41]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 10:57:41]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 10:57:42]

[2018-12-16 10:57:42]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, amount
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 10:57:55]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
                                        email_content,attention_to
                                        , attachment
                                        , notes
                                        , remarks
                                        , cms_outbound_document.email as to_email
                                        , cms_master_list.descr as category
                                        , cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email
                                         FROM cms_outbound_document 
                                        LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_outbound_document.ctg_id = cms_master_list.id
                                        LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_outbound_document.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE outbound_no='18-0000001'

									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date

				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 10:58:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 10:58:34]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 10:58:34]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 10:58:35]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date

SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,

                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 11:00:27]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:00:27]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 11:00:31]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:00:31]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:00:31]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:00:31]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:00:32]

 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:00:51]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 11:01:22]
Function Details: get_doc_primary_no 
 Param Details : 
"doc_no cms_document_archiving"


[2018-12-16 11:01:22]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-',  LPAD(  SUBSTRING_INDEX(MAX(doc_no),'-',-1) + 1 ,7,'0000000')), CONCAT( RIGHT(YEAR(NOW()),2),'-','0000001')) AS doc_no  FROM cms_document_archiving WHERE YEAR(created_date) = YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY doc_no desc limit 0,1


[2018-12-16 11:01:22]

[2018-12-16 11:01:26]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_document_archiving_details 
 Param Details : 
{"document_no":"18-0000001"}


[2018-12-16 11:01:29]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  doc_no		
						, date_format(doc_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as doc_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, doc_type
						, date_format(from_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as from_date	
						, date_format(to_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as to_date	
						, notify
						, date_format(notify_by,'%d-%m-%Y') as notify_by	
						, notify_email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, notes
						, approvals
						, status_id						
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by	
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_document_archiving WHERE doc_no = '18-0000001'

Function Details: db_update
 Param Details: 
   		UPDATE cms_document_archiving SET doc_no = :doc_no, doc_date = :doc_date, client_id = :client_id, employer_id = :employer_id, doc_type = :doc_type, from_date = :from_date, to_date = :to_date, notify = :notify, notify_by = :notify_by, notify_email = :notify_email, attachment = :attachment, notes = :notes, status_id = :status_id, updated_by = :updated_by, updated_date = :updated_date WHERE doc_no = :doc_no 


[2018-12-16 11:01:33]
Function Details: db_update
 Param Details: 
 Array
(
    [:doc_no] => 18-0000001
    [:doc_date] => 2018-12-10
    [:client_id] => 1

[2018-12-16 11:01:43]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:01:43]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                           FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                           WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                           UNION ALL
                           SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                           cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                           FROM
                           cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                           WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:01:45]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, amount
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = '18-0000001'

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, cms_outbound_document.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.amount
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.status_id
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:01:52]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:02:02]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 11:02:53]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as doc_type,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_document_archiving 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_document_archiving.doc_type = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_document_archiving.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE doc_no='18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 11:02:53]
Function Details: get_mail_signature 
 Param Details : 
"sancheev@gmail.com"


[2018-12-16 11:02:53]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:02:54]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"17"


[2018-12-16 11:02:54]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 17 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 11:03:31]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:03:31]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 11:04:11]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:04:11]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 11:04:25]
Business Layer: {"token":"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98","method":"get_document_archiving_details","data":{"document_no":"18-0000001"}}


[2018-12-16 11:04:25]
Function Details: is_token_valid 
 Param Details : 
"03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98"


[2018-12-16 11:04:25]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT count(token) as token_count  FROM cms_emp_login_sessions WHERE token	= '03293db0a67871ad036730841905cf98'


[2018-12-16 11:04:25]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_details 
 Param Details : 
{"document_no":"18-0000001"}


[2018-12-16 11:04:25]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  doc_no		
						, date_format(doc_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as doc_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, doc_type
						, date_format(from_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as from_date	
						, date_format(to_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as to_date	
						, notify
						, date_format(notify_by,'%d-%m-%Y') as notify_by	
						, notify_email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, notes
						, approvals
						, status_id						
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by	
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_document_archiving WHERE doc_no = '18-0000001'

SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-12-16 11:06:01]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 11:06:01]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-12-16 11:06:01]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,employer_name FROM cms_master_employer WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:06:01]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details:

                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_document_archiving.doc_type = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_document_archiving.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE doc_no='18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 11:06:36]
Function Details: get_mail_signature 
 Param Details : 
"sancheev@gmail.com"


[2018-12-16 11:06:36]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:06:37]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"17"


[2018-12-16 11:06:37]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 17 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 11:06:50]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT attachment,cms_master_list.descr as doc_type,cms_employees.office_email as created_by_email FROM cms_document_archiving 
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_master_list ON cms_document_archiving.doc_type = cms_master_list.id
                                      LEFT JOIN cms_employees ON cms_document_archiving.created_by = cms_employees.id WHERE doc_no='18-0000001'


[2018-12-16 11:06:50]
Function Details: get_mail_signature 
 Param Details : 
"sancheev@gmail.com"


[2018-12-16 11:06:50]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_employees.name, cms_master_employer.mail_signature
									FROM cms_employees
									LEFT JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
									WHERE cms_employees.office_email in('sancheev@gmail.com') AND cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-12-16 11:06:50]
Function Details: get_verifier_approver 
 Param Details : 
"17"


[2018-12-16 11:06:50]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT group_concat(office_email SEPARATOR ';') as email
									FROM cms_employees
									INNER JOIN cms_employees_access ON cms_employees.id =  cms_employees_access.emp_id
									WHERE cms_employees_access.module_id = 17 AND verify_it = 1 AND approve_it = 1 AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-12-16 11:06:53]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:06:53]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-12-16 11:07:17]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, cms_document_archiving.employer_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.status_id
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-12-16 11:07:22]
Function Details: get_document_archiving_details 
 Param Details : 
{"document_no":"18-0000001"}


[2018-12-16 11:07:22]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  doc_no		
						, date_format(doc_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as doc_date	
						, client_id
						, employer_id
						, doc_type
						, date_format(from_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as from_date	
						, date_format(to_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as to_date	
						, notify
						, date_format(notify_by,'%d-%m-%Y') as notify_by	
						, notify_email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, notes
						, approvals
						, status_id						
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by	
						, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name			
					 FROM cms_document_archiving WHERE doc_no = '18-0000001'

				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10
